医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
可可黄烷醇可以保护血管系统免受压力​新研究发现，即使在吃了高脂肪食物后，富含黄烷醇的可可饮料也可以保护身体的脉管系统免受压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Cocoa-flavanols-canprotect-the-angio-system-from-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Cocoa-flavanols-canprotect-the-angio-system-from-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b04b89d-a812-4a4d-a00d-d6aea552e40d Mon, 18 Nov 2024 13:23:00 -0500 Cocoa flavanols can protect the vascular system from stress
翻新起搏器在全球试验中被证明安全有效一项随机试验比较了患者以前使用过的起搏器和新起搏器，发现翻新的设备与新起搏器一样安全有效，可能为低收入和中等收入国家的患者提供负担得起的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Reconditioned-pacemakers-prove-safe-and- effective-in-global-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Reconditioned-pacemakers-prove-safe-and- effective-in-global-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5c49eb3-eafb-4c5f-bc56-b83f95309eb6 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 13:16:10 -0500 Reconditioned pacemakers prove safe and effective in global trial
常见的心力衰竭药物可降低癌症患者化疗引起的心脏损伤的风险根据今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上公布的初步最新科学成果，在接受蒽环类药物化疗的高危癌症患者中，一种常用的治疗心力衰竭的处方药物与降低心脏损伤或心脏毒性的风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Common-heart-failure-drug-reduces-risk-of-chemotherapy-induced-heart-damage-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Common-heart-failure-drug-reduces-risk-of-chemotherapy-induced-heart-damage-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=523985a6-f1d8-49c2-ab1a-a882b29f358f Mon, 18 Nov 2024 13:14:32 -0500 Common heart failure drug reduces risk of chemotherapy-induced heart damage in cancer patients
对疼痛信号传导的新见解可能会带来更好的慢性疼痛治疗当疼痛信号沿着神经系统传递时，称为钙通道的蛋白质发挥着关键作用。瑞典林雪平大学的研究人员现已查明了微调疼痛信号强度的特定钙通道的确切位置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-insights-into-pain-signaling-could-lead-to-better-chronic-pain-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-insights-into-pain-signaling-could-lead-to-better-chronic-pain-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05cf829a-0d54-4641-9164-29973646cd9d Mon, 18 Nov 2024 13:06:34 -0500 New insights into pain signaling could lead to better chronic pain treatment
新型“喷洗式”绷带可能彻底改变大疱性表皮松解症的治疗对新型绷带的研究旨在减轻患有遗传性皮肤病大疱性表皮松解症（EB）（通常被称为“蝴蝶皮肤”）的人们所经历的痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-spray-on-wash-off-bandages-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-Epidermothesis-Bullosa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-spray-on-wash-off-bandages-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-Epidermothesis-Bullosa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bad9e67-d80e-4a3f-9d0f-42401ebecf9d Mon, 18 Nov 2024 13:01:35 -0500 New 'spray on, wash off' bandages could revolutionize treatment for Epidermolysis Bullosa
快速手指刺破可能很快就会使阿尔茨海默病测试变得更加容易快速刺破手指，然后在一张可以通过普通邮件发送的卡片上滴几滴血。这种方法很快将使阿尔茨海默氏症测试在全世界范围内变得更加容易进行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Quick-finger-prick-could-soon-make-Alzheimers-testing-much-more-accessible.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Quick-finger-prick-could-soon-make-Alzheimers-testing-much-more-accessible.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6986a106-362f-45f2-bfa0-2d2e8c72524b Mon, 18 Nov 2024 12:45:54 -0500 Quick finger prick could soon make Alzheimer's testing much more accessible
民意调查显示，一些父母可能难以控制孩子的愤怒许多父母都非常熟悉孩子的愤怒爆发，从兄弟姐妹的争吵到对屏幕时间限制的抗议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Some-parents-may-struggle-with-managing-childrens-anger-poll-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Some-parents-may-struggle-with-managing-childrens-anger-poll-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e7d5406-f33b-499f-9bee-97d57cd06b14 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 12:41:00 -0500 Some parents may struggle with managing children's anger, poll suggests
创新平台有助于探索 99 种疾病的遗传联系一项新研究介绍了全蛋白质组协会研究中心，这是一个创新而强大的工具，旨在探索 99 种常见疾病的基因与疾病之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Innovative-platform-helps-explore-genic-links-to-99-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Innovative-platform-helps-explore-genic-links-to-99-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ebbd5e7-4156-46aa-a262-d5df51d3dd65 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 12:29:00 -0500 Innovative platform helps explore genetic links to 99 diseases
气温上升助长登革热感染的全球蔓延气候变化对登革热传播产生了巨大的全球影响，占当前登革热负担的 19%，到 2050 年可能会导致登革热负担再增加 40%-60%；在某些地区高达 150%-200% -；根据今天在美国热带医学与卫生学会 (ASTMH) 年会上公布的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Rising-temporals-fuel-global-spread-of-dengue-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Rising-Temperatures-fuel-global-spread-of-dengue-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac357bd9-24d0-4955-af6f-d4c13f483669 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 12:19:34 -0500 Rising temperatures fuel global spread of dengue infections
研究揭示了艾滋病毒潜伏期背后的关键机制杜克大学健康中心的研究人员报告说，一种可能进化来帮助抵抗感染的免疫反应似乎是驱使人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）进入潜伏状态的机制，潜伏在细胞中只是为了重新爆发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Study-uncovers-key-mechanism-behind-HIV-latency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Study-uncovers-key-mechanism-behind-HIV-latency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a668ae6c-9c8e-415b-9f78-0350e934aa13 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 12:12:09 -0500 Study uncovers key mechanism behind HIV latency
